definition: straight/to straighten/fair and reasonable/frank/straightforward/(indicates continuing motion or action)/vertical/vertical downward stroke in Chinese characters
surname Zhi/Zhi (c. 2000 BC), fifth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
to (a place)/until (a time)/up to/to go/to arrive/(verb complement denoting completion or result of an action)
even now/until now/right up to the present

sentences.chinese: 这些劳累的孩子直到7点才回家。

sentences.english: We can dance 'til the break of dawn.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以一直跳舞直到天明。

sentences.english: The four-letter words were always edited out of radio scripts until quite recently.
sentences.chinese: 直到最近广播稿中的庸俗词语才让保留下来。

sentences.english: Spin me around til I fell asleep.
sentences.chinese: 抱着我旋转直到我睡着。

sentences.english: So they were shut up unto the day of their death, living in widowhood.
sentences.chinese: 她们如同寡妇被禁，直到死的日子。

sentences.english: She nursed her husband back to health.
sentences.chinese: 她精心照料丈夫，直到他康复。

sentences.english: The Chinese Exclusion Act was repealed only in 1943.
sentences.chinese: 直到1943年排华法案才被取消。

sentences.english: Bourgeois houses only began to spring up there twenty-five years later.
sentences.chinese: 有钱人家的房屋直到二十五年前才开始在这里出现。

sentences.english: So long as opens the mouth to sing, lengthens until the dream, hears the echo to be resonant.
sentences.chinese: 只要开口唱，直到梦想延长，听到回音多嘹亮。

sentences.english: Kneading dough by hand until the non-stick hand up.
sentences.chinese: 用手揉面团，直到不粘手为止。

sentences.english: Calmly wait ’til they’re done, and then provide the answer.
sentences.chinese: 冷静地等待，直到他们说完，然后再给出你的回答。

sentences.english: Repeat this procedure until every pattern piece has been individually traced-off.
sentences.chinese: 重复这道程序，直到每一张衣片纸样独立描下。

sentences.english: Love will make your life easier to pass, until one day you can breath no more.
sentences.chinese: 爱将使您的生活通过，直到一天您没能呼吸。

sentences.english: The village leader, Mr. Tian, asks Wei Minzhi to take Mr. Gao's place until he comes back.
sentences.chinese: 田村长让魏敏芝替高老师代课，直到他回来。

sentences.english: The discomfort subsides gradually over one or two weeks, leaving the joint apparently normal, and pain-free.
sentences.chinese: 不适感会在一到两周内逐渐减弱，直到关节恢复正常。

sentences.english: 8 the Lord will watch over your coming and going both now and forevermore.
sentences.chinese: 你出你入耶和华要保护你，从今时直到永远。

definition: ability/talent/sb of a certain type/a capable individual/only/only then/just now
a moment ago/just now/(indicating sth happening later than expected)/(preceded by a clause of condition or reason) not until/(followed by a numerical clause) only
to wait until/by the time when (sth is ready etc)
until/(used in combination with words like 到[dao4] or 至[zhi4] in constructs of the form 到...為止|到...为止)
straight (in a straight line)/continuously/always/from the beginning of ... up to .../all along
